variables

Class Variable

  • java.lang.Object
    • variables.Variable
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    XInteger, XString

    public class Variable
extends java.lang.Object

    Variable

    This class contains all methods for parsing variables from Interpreter.
    Author:
    Szymon Kocur
